t: HubSpot Announces Three-Year Collaboration with Amazon Web Services to Support the Startup Ecosystem
s: January 19, 2023 - HubSpot has entered a three-year commitment with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to help startups grow better. Through the agreement, HubSpot will leverage AWS services to expand its platform and provide added benefits to members of the Connect and HubSpot for Startups programs.
